# serval_group (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "serval_group" "example_group" {
  name = "name"
  user_ids = ["string"]
}
```

## Argument Reference

This resource supports the following arguments:

- `name` (Optional) The name of the group.
- `user_ids` (Optional) The IDs of users in the group.

## Attribute Reference

This resource exports the following attributes in addition to the arguments above:

- `id` (String) The ID of the group.
- `created_at` (String) Timestamp in RFC 3339 format.
- `deleted_at` (String) Timestamp in RFC 3339 format.
- `organization_id` (String) The ID of the organization the group belongs to.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
$ terraform import serval_group.example '<id>'
```
